work.title: Programmer Analyst

work.title: Programmer Analyst Intern
work.description: Programmed a .NET WinRT app for Windows 8 that followed an MVVM design pattern with offline/online sync feature that replaced an inefficient and unprofessional customer facing, archaic, paper process with an elegant mobile app to capture customer identified defects. Responsible for performing user interviews and programming new application features based on the received feedback. Delivered a user-centered, feature-rich app update to production.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: Programmed a feature-rich, web application using Google Web Toolkit SDK, Java, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, AJAX, with Google and Facebook OAuth API integrations for login and sharing. Responsible for architecting, developing, refactoring, optimizing, debugging, testing, and deploying the ROA web app. Resulted in delivery of features & performance optimizations.
